org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.stats.pairstat

Class PairIntegerTagCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.stats.pairstat.PairIntegerTagCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PairEndReadStatFunction<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean>, StatFunction<java.lang.Integer,scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead>>

    public class PairIntegerTagCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PairEndReadStatFunction<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean>
    Counts the number of read pairs whose integer SAM tag is compared to a threshold.

    If the tag is not present for any of the read pairs, that pair is not included in the count.
